remarks: Define the arithmetic progression function, which takes as input a length ` k ` , a start point ` a ` , and a step ` d ` and outputs the set of points in this progression.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)
statement:
df-vdwap $p |- AP = ( k e. NN0 |-> ( a e. NN , d e. NN |-> ran ( m e. ( 0 ... ( k - 1 ) ) |-> ( a + ( m x. d ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d a d k m $.
